We have an easy way for you to get WBAL on your Amazon device. Simply tell your Alexa – “Alexa, launch WBAL” OR you can get the skill directly HERE – and make sure to write us an awesome review. Plus – you can hear us on Google Home – Just say “Hey Google, Play WBAL”
